Pre-Game Insights: Lallianzuala Chhangte emphasized the importance of making the best of the limited time available before the AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers.
Chhangte stated that the team must not be complacent and must do whatever it takes to be prepared for the Asian Cup qualification.
He highlighted the need for both physical and mental strength within the team and a stronger bond among team members.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India is set to play Mauritius (Tuesday, September 3, 2024) and Syria (Monday, September 9, 2024) in the Intercontinental Cup at the Gachibowli Stadium in Hyderabad.
The matches will be broadcast live on Sports 18 3 and streamed live on Jio Cinema.
Others: Lallianzuala Chhangte was named the AIFF Player of the Year earlier this year.
He scored a goal against Qatar in the FIFA World Cup Qualifiers, bringing India close to booking their spot in Round 3.
Chhangte has dealt with setbacks in his career, but has come back strong through hard work and dedication.
